title: Honor
body: Hey, uhh i got muted for the language i was using and i do agree i had a bad game that game and i am so sorry . However i do not agree that my honor gets locked as you can see in almost all of my previous games i have got honored thats why i was level 4 but just from a couple reports i get locked on honor? I legit had a bad day and i served my punishment of 10 games muted so can yous please take off the lock on my honor? i am legit sooo sorry and i will do my best to stay positive on the rift :D
